name: Rachid Taha
description: '''Rachid Taha''' ({{langx|ar|رشيد طه}}, {{lang-Latn|ar|Rashīd Ṭāhā}}, {{IPA|ar|raʃiːd tˤaːhaː|}}; 18 September 1958 – 12 September 2018) was an [[Algerian people|Algerian]]-French singer and activist based in France described as "sonically adventurous". His music was influenced by many different styles including [[rock and roll|rock]], [[Electronic music|electronic]], [[Punk rock|punk]] and [[raï]].
